example_sentences.eng_trans: The whole audience was charmed [enchanted, entranced] by [with] the sweet melody.
example_sentences.jap_sentence: 観客はみなその美しいメロディーにうっとりした

example_sentences.eng_trans: She gazed in [with] rapture at the engagement ring.
example_sentences.jap_sentence: 彼女はうっとりと婚約指輪を見つめた

example_sentences.eng_trans: He felt intoxicated by the wine.
example_sentences.jap_sentence: 彼はそのぶどう酒にうっとりした気持ちになった
